article_node.title: Jeremy Clarkson issues furious statement as he addresses 'moving abroad'
article_node.summary: Jeremy Clarkson has angrily denied rumors that he is planning to move abroad, issuing a scathing Instagram statement to refute clickbait reports. He reiterated his support for British farmers, criticizing proposed ‘tractor tax’ legislation and urging citizens to stay in the UK. Clarkson also highlighted his recent column in The Times, where he warned against leaving Britain amid economic uncertainty. The controversy centers on his dual role as a media personality and outspoken advocate for the agricultural sector.
